name: NRS Hydroskin 0.5mm Jacket - Men's
description:
Take the edge off the water's chill. This long-sleeved jacket is stretchy and adds a little bit of insulation so you can stay in the water a little longer.Terreprene is non-allergenic and neoprene-free, made of limestone and recycled rubber tires.4-way stretch Terreprene is 0.5mm thick on the torso and arms, with spandex underarm panels.Body-mapped design allows comfortable range of motion.Titanium layer reflects heat back to your body so you stay warmer.ThermalPlush lining is warm and comfortable next to skin.Full-length flexible zipper closes smoothly.

        Sustainability
